ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.TEXT:
Traheja d.o.o. has been operating for nearly a quarter of a century, and since its founding in 2003, it has established a strong position in both domestic and international markets. Years of experience, commitment to quality, and numerous satisfied clients have made the Traheja name synonymous with reliability, functionality, and stylish furniture.

Our extensive range of products — made from solid wood, particle board, and MDF — meets the needs of both business spaces and modern homes. Whether it’s office furniture or home furnishings, each piece is thoughtfully designed with attention to detail and user comfort.
